title: Add `padding_value` to `pad_sequence`
body_html:
It would be nice if torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_sequence had a padding_value similar to torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_packed_sequence one.

This should be relatively easy and I already have a PR ready, but I am unsure of the policy for that kind of nearly trivial changes.
body_text:
It would be nice if torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_sequence had a padding_value similar to torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_packed_sequence one.
This should be relatively easy and I already have a PR ready, but I am unsure of the policy for that kind of nearly trivial changes.
body:
It would be nice if [`torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_sequence`](http://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html#torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_sequence) had a `padding_value` similar to [`torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_packed_sequence`](http://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html#torch.nn.utils.rnn.pad_packed_sequence) one.

This should be relatively easy and I already have a PR ready, but I am unsure of the policy for that kind of nearly trivial changes.
